headlines.description: AC Milan produced another comeback act as they scored three times after the break to beat Parma 3-1 in Serie A on Wednesday.
headlines.shortLinkText: AC Milan remain undefeated since restart in win over Parma

headlines.description: Gambia striker Musa Barrow netted an equaliser 10 minutes from fulltime as unlucky Bologna held Napoli to a 1-1 home Serie A draw.
headlines.shortLinkText: In-form Barrow seals point for Bologna against Napoli

headlines.description: Federico Bonazzoli scored twice, including another acrobatic volley, to help Sampdoria to a 3-0 win over Cagliari on Wednesday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Bonazzoli scores with another flying volley in Sampdoria win

headlines.description: AS Roma clocked up a third successive Serie A win by beating Verona 2-1 on Wednesday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Roma win again as Verona fume over penalty

venue.fullName: Stadio Ettore Giardiniero - Via del Mare

venue.displayName: Stadio Ettore Giardiniero - Via del Mare

headlines.description: Cristiano Ronaldo's run of scoring in six league games ended as jittery Juventus were held to a 3-3 draw at Sassuolo.
headlines.shortLinkText: Ronaldo draws blank as jittery Juventus held at Sassuolo

headlines.description: Lazio's unhappy run continued with a lacklustre 0-0 draw at Udinese, although they at least avoided a fourth successive Serie A defeat.
headlines.shortLinkText: Post saves lacklustre Lazio in 0-0 draw at Udinese
